this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - green - yarn needle - scissors final size - height of 6 cm and length of 36 cm technical notes *the slime is worked in one piece *at the end of each row is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern slime green row 1 chain 57 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 single_crochet in each chain across 56 sts *for row 2 you will be making 16 drips row 2 drip 1 chain 7 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 4 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 3 sts 9 sts drip 2 chain 5 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 6 sts drip 3 chain 11 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 8 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 12 sts drip 4 chain 6 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 3 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 3 sts 8 sts drip 5 chain 7 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 4 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 3 sts 9 sts drip 6 chain 5 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 6 sts drip 7 chain 11 start in the second chain from the hook
